name: Laser Jumper
description:
The goal of the game is quite simple; get from one side to the other.  But, it is painstakingly difficult at times.  Click/tap to change gravity to dodge lasers, and score points by hitting the opposite side.

You can also find it on the Google Play store: Click here

This is the first of my many games that I shall develop :)

EDIT: Ads have been removed from the Android version! (.jar never had ads)

EDIT #2: I have finally fixed the bug of taps not being accurate on resized windows :D (dang you static variables!)
